titleStmt.title: A letter from a student at Oxford to a friend in the country concerning the approaching Parliament, in vindication of His Majesty, the Church of England and University.
titleStmt.author: Kennett, White, 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to White Kennett by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Includes postscript: The humble address of an academick mule, to His Majesty; p. 19-22.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
